description: I'm a stickler for effiency, so I take any opportunity to dive into some low-level C programming. I've done some internships writing C, and teach it at UQ.

skills.name: C (Embedded, Windows, Linux)
skills.description: I've worked on Windows vulnerability exploits in C, and wrote code for STM32 and Atmel devices in projects. I've taught C courses for 2 years.
